text: Museum Middle School was a public middle school in Yonkers, New York, United States. Museum Middle School was run by the Yonkers Public Schools. Museum was home to the city's academically talented (AT) program for middle schoolers and another program coordinated with the Hudson River Museum next to the school. It is in one of the newest school buildings in Yonkers, having been built in the early 1990s. It is near the Hudson River. Principals were Dr. Catherine Mayus, Ms. Christine Wagner, and Mr. Shapiro.Middle School Principals . Yonkers Public Schools Museum Middle School is now Riverside High School for Engineering and Design. ==References== ==External links== * Museum Middle School Category:Defunct schools in New York (state) Category:Education in Yonkers, New York
title: Museum Middle School
